look_around.text: You see a path leading deeper into the forest and a cabin with smoke coming out of the chimney.

stay_still.text: You stay still, but the cold begins to seep into your bones. You might not survive long like this.

follow_path.text: You follow the path and encounter a wild animal blocking your way.

go_to_cabin.text: You knock on the cabin door, and an old man answers. He looks friendly and invites you inside.

scare_off.text: You wave your arms and yell. The animal flees, and you continue on your journey.

cabin_inside.text: Inside the cabin, you find warmth and a hot meal. The old man tells you stories of the forest.

end_good.text: You rest and regain your strength, ready to face the challenges ahead. The End.
